interface.name: postgresql_search_db
interface.summary: Allow the specified domain to search postgresql's database directory.

interface.name: postgresql_manage_db
interface.summary: Allow the specified domain to manage postgresql's database.

interface.name: postgresql_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute postgresql in the postgresql domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: postgresql_read_config
interface.summary: Allow the specified domain to read postgresql's etc.

interface.name: postgresql_tcp_connect
interface.summary: Allow the specified domain to connect to postgresql with a tcp socket. (Deprecated)

interface.name: postgresql_stream_connect
interface.summary: Allow the specified domain to connect to postgresql with a unix socket.
